title: Senator hits Trump for blaming Epstein backlash on Dems
shortDescription: Minnesota Sen. Amy Klobuchar knocked President Donald Trump for blaming Democrats over the backlash his administration faces on the Jeffrey Epstein case.

title: Trump looks to the South to grow ICE detention
shortDescription: Louisiana, long known for its 'prison economy,' now houses more ICE detention facilities than any other non-border state.

title: Trump's on a roll. Why isn't he smiling? Answer: Jeffrey Epstein
shortDescription: Overshadowed is Congress' willingness to cede a constitutional power to the White House. Instead, the case of a disgraced and dead financier looms.

title: Inside Trump's golden 'perfecto' approach to design at the White House
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has his own personal aesthetic, evident in his makeover of the White House. 'It keeps my real estate juices flowing," he said.

title: Trump EPA cuts research and development office
shortDescription: The research and development office had been in the crosshairs of organizations allied with President Donald Trump.

title: Trump sues Wall Street Journal over Epstein letter story
shortDescription: President Trump filed a $10 billion lawsuit against Rupert Murdoch and the Wall Street Journal over claims he sent Epstein a lewd birthday letter.

title: Trump: Epstein grand jury records unlikely to satisfy critics
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has struggled to meet demands he helped stoked for information about Jeffrey Epstein's criminal case.

title: What to know about the latest twists in the Trump, Epstein saga
shortDescription: President Trump is seeking an unprecedented amount of damages in his lawsuit challenging a Wall Street Journal report about his Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Trump wants Supreme Court to bring down hammer on gun rules
shortDescription: Since President Trump took office, the Justice Department has backed challenges to gun regulations. And it did not appeal a ruling against a federal age limit on handguns.

title: 'Che Guevara of Greenland': An evening with Trump's Arctic 'son'
shortDescription: A 51-year-old former bricklayer may be the most fervent supporter of Trump in the entire Arctic. But it's not always easy being Jorgen Boassen.

title: Trump DOJ asks court to release Epstein grand jury records
shortDescription: The Justice Department's July 18 motion to release Epstein grand jury transcripts followed a request Trump made to Attorney General Pam Bondi.

title: Trump's no good, very Epstein week: What to know
shortDescription: Donald Trump's Jeffrey Epstein headache persisted this week with a new report on his alleged ties to Epstein and ongoing calls for transparency.

title: Trump sues WSJ, Murdoch and reporters for article on Epstein letter
shortDescription: Trump sued the Wall Street Journal over its reporting on a letter he labelled as "FAKE" and claimed its story is "false, malicious, and defamatory."

title: Congress passes Trump's $9 billion cuts: 3 takeaways from the drama
shortDescription: A drama-filled week in DC saw Democrats accuse Republicans ceding Congress' power to Trump and a curveball involving Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Trump signs historic crypto law into effect
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed the Genius Act, establishing the first U.S. crypto law regulating stablecoins.

title: ¿Dónde están los archivos de Epstein? Seguidores de Trump exigen respuestas y transparencia
shortDescription: La base de seguidores de Donald Trump está molesta porque sienten que su promesa de transparencia total ha sido traicionada.

title: College leaders await NIL regulation. Trump's grandaughter scores deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has reportedly been considering an executive order on student athelete NIL for some time. His grandaughter has multiple deals.

title: Trump unfreezes $1 billion in school funding after states sued
shortDescription: The Trump administration said it would release more than $1 billion in federal funding for after-school programs that had been paused.

title: Trump signs 'Genius Act,' delivering major win to crypto industry
shortDescription: President Trump, who is rapidly expanding his fortunate by investing in crypto, has now signed the first major piece of crypto legislation into law.

title: Third Biden aide refuses to talk in GOP 'autopen' probe
shortDescription: Rep. James Comer said a former deputy chief of staff invoked her Fifth Amendment rights when asked if anyone “instructed her to lie."

title: Trump and Newsom clash over rail project
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Governor Gavin Newsom traded jabs as federal officials pulled $4 billion from California’s high-speed rail.

title: 'Certain things in common:' Read WSJ-reported Trump letter to Epstein
shortDescription: Growing controversy over the criminal case files of sex offender Jeffrey Epstein now includes a the Wall Street Journal report of a Trump letter.
